caption.p: Clinical phase vaccine candidates for COVID-19. aAPC, artificial antigen-presenting cell; MHC, major histocompatibility complex class; VLP, virus-like particle; DC, dendritic cell; LV, lentiviral vector; CTLs, cytotoxic T lymphocytes; HLA-A, a group of human leukocyte antigens (HLA) that are coded for by the HLA-A locus. Created with BioRender.com.
